entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM: BrowserDebugHost.dll running from DevServer is missing roll-forward runtime policy #88391
  • The truncating conversion from BigInteger to Int128 ignores most significant bits #88389
  • JIT: Teach physical promotion to peel FIELD_ADDR nodes #88386
  • Additional Metrics for System.Net.Http #88384
    8.0.0
  • Implement the Metrics counterpart of System.Net EventCounters #88383
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 7/1/2023 10:14:52 PM #88376
  • Regression in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4.TransformBenchmark #88377
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> and System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<Int32> #88378
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 6/30/2023 4:39:46 PM #88375
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972.cmd #88361

Closed

  • Vector<T> Can't Read Data Properly. #88291
  • GC Gen size counters don't show on Linux in native AOT #87325
    8.0.0
  • TryParseExact not working properly for TimeSpan and custom format not working for "\" in DateTime and DateTimeOffset #88372
  • Additional metrics for .NET Core and ASP.NET Core #79459
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!(*use)->OperMayThrow(m_compiler)' #88349
    8.0.0
  • System.Uri considers all email addresses in same domain as equal #87564
    8.0.0
  • _marshal_task_to_cs calls complete_task on already completed task #87963
    8.0.0
  • [browser] configure rollup to minify internal method names #86447
    8.0.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios for HttpClient logging #87247
    8.0.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in HttpClient metrics middleware #87245
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Rd.xml file parsing should provide better reporting #64869
    Future
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization workaround instead of insufficiently sized destination buffer exception #88180
  • Bad Windows batch file syntax in libraries test script #88353
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Chrome crashes in debugger tests #86919
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #86553
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Update minimum CMake version required to build the dotnet/runtime repo to 3.20 #74027
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Respect KeepNativeSymbols when building cross compilers. #88398
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix another crash when using opaque pointers. #88397
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disallow Options source gen produce diagnostics from outside the compilation #88396
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve non-SIMD block copy/init codegen #88393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline more helpers in RegexParser #88392
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Compute BB weights with higher precision, use tolerance in if-conversion #88385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate multi-reg-index for upper-vector-restore ref positions #88380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Incorrect timestamp for perf events #88373
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Bring back old array enumerator code #88371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Precompute the CallInfo structure used by the mono_arch_..nati… #88369
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • change regex options tests to extension method #88366
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix writing of WCHAR strings to event pipe buffer in nativeaot #88365
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update testing.md #88364
    area-Meta
  • Fix SIMD node DOT retType #88363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update missing runtime/framework install URL to use host RID #88359
    area-Host

Merged

  • Allow inlining array methods #88367
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Extract simd create opcodes in separate methods #88381
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the NotImplementedException within R2RDump. #88379
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding/promotions in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Quirk a quirk in fgExpandVirtualVtableCallTarget #88374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Reenable disabled tests as mono now respects non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #88322
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove empty files #88362
    area-Meta
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] log errors of Task/Promise marshaling #88326
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Unified source file formatting #88330
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Remove conservative generic scanning logic #88360
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix libraries Windows test runner script #88354
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve LoggerFactory and Logger debugging #88313
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [RISCV] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Work around for Android builds using GCC for cross compiler native tools build #88345
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Make DoesConsoleSupportAnsi respect DOTNET_SYSTEM_CONSOLE_ALLOW_ANSI_COLOR_REDIRECTION #88241
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Internalize assetUniqueQuery as modulesUniqueQuery #88329
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    arch-arm64, area-System.Buffers, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix floating point #88311
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Simpler and more precise init semantics for locals #2332

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: switch WASI target to wasm32-wasi #2317
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call runtime imports implemented by runtime exports directly #2321
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Put the shadow stack allocator into its own class #2324
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug break on assertion failure #2327

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Double-align the shadow frame when necessary #2315

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it a bug? #33767
  • Why do I have to define a property when deserializing json with System.Text.Json? #33766

PullRequests

Created

  • Containers: support mapping non-portable (source-built) rids to container manifest platforms. #33775
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider - experiment #33773
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Containers: sync CreateNewImageToolTask with new CreateNewImage properties. #33765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disabled `--version` option for `dotnet new details` #33761
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers

Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pressing Tab key causes unwanted code changes #68873
  • Discarded constructor parameter produces diagnostic after converting to primary constructor #68869

PullRequests

Created

  • Disallow applying `RequiresLocationAttribute` to parameters in source #68871
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Filter `RequiresLocationAttribute` from `ref readonly` parameters #68870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Enhance navigation different interaction behavior #49210
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext #49209
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #49208
  • [Blazor] Enhanced form navigation does not seem to handle collections correctly. #49207
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, mapaction #49206
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, updates #49205
  • An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection in Blazor SSR 8.0.100-preview.5 #49203
  • Winform & Blazor can't show image in local #49202
  • Checkbox Tag-Helper ignores form attribute when hidden input is generated #49201
  • Perf regression: mvc #49198
  • [gRPC] How to correctly transmit error details to client with gRPC-JSON transcoding? #49196
  • Always set IExceptionHandlerFeature from UseDeveloperExceptionPage #49195
  • Razor Pages post to incorrect handler with "OnPost" and "OnPostXxx" #49194

Closed

  • PaginationState.CurrentPageIndex is read-only #49149
  • Add TemplateRow in Blazor QuickGrid #49004
  • Unix socket not deleted at startup in Blazor.DevServer #46001
    8.0-preview7
  • DateOnly binding in minimal API is broken when using dd-MM-yyyy or dd/MM/yyyy #47734
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #49163
  • ProblemDetails are not returned when an application is started via a WebApplicationFactory (i.e in an integration test) #48809

PullRequests

Created

  • Root-level cascading values + CascadingAuthenticationState at root #49204
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Support updating/changing the binding prefix #49199
    area-blazor
  • Remove ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #49193
    area-identity

Merged

  • [Blazor] Skip failing tests due to incorrect dependency update #49200
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add support for antiforgery #49108
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pages retained in memory when using DynamicResource Grid style #15986
  • CollectionView scroll in .NET MAUI Overlaps UI when there are more data. [in iOS] #15983
  • [MAUI] New recipe page is missing "New recipe" title after rotating emulator/device. #15982

Closed

  • Can't get BindableProperty to work #15976
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI App template not showing #15094
  • Hot Reload does not work or stops working in some specific cases #13052
    Backlog
  • Connectivity.ConnectionProfiles contains WiFi instead of Ethernet when Ethernet connection is available #13299
    Backlog
  • [Windows] IsVisible on shell menu items through ViewModel randomly duplicates shell menu items #14467
    Backlog
  • can't find option to create maui project #14959
  • Problem With MAUI and Angular in Visual 22 #15097
  • Android Device Manager briefly appears then disappears #15554
  • XamlC error XFC0000 : Cannot resolve type "Application". #15904
  • Archiving apk using .net 7.0+ for android includes wrong platforms #15971
  • App won't run n Windows Machine #15978

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.2.0 #15987
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15980
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance. #15734
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Include headers/footers in EmptySource count so they show up when ItemsSource is null #15979
    area/collectionview 📃

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for combining TPH and TPT inheritance strategies #31184

Closed

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646
